list.title: module:Interaction
list.description:
Interaction module providing utility functions for interacting with web pages.

This module includes functions for selecting dropdown options, handling scrolling behavior,
and interacting with elements via CSS selectors or XPath. It is designed to support various
interaction scenarios, including random scrolling and precise element targeting.

list.title: module:Interaction~clearInput
list.description: Clears the value of an input field using either a Selector or XPath.

list.title: module:Interaction~clearInputBySelector
list.description: Clears the value of an input field using a Selector.

list.title: module:Interaction~clearInputByXpath
list.description: Clears the value of an input field using an XPath selector.

list.title: module:Interaction~clickElement
list.description:
Utility to click an element using either a Selector or XPath, with navigation handling.
Prevents race conditions by detecting and managing navigation before execution.

list.title: module:Interaction~clickElementBySelector
list.description:
Clicks an element using a CSS selector.
Ensures navigation detection is set up in advance to prevent race conditions.

list.title: module:Interaction~clickElementByXpath
list.description:
Clicks an element using an XPath selector.
Ensures navigation detection is set up in advance to prevent race conditions.

list.title: module:Interaction~handleGmailNavigation
list.description:
Handles navigation for Gmail, ensuring stability after redirections.
Listens for frame navigation events and waits until the page is settled.

list.title: module:Interaction~handleHotmailNavigation
list.description:
Handles navigation for Hotmail, ensuring stability after redirections.
Listens for frame navigation events and waits until the page is settled.

list.title: module:Interaction~keyPress
list.description: Simulates a key press event on a specified element.

list.title: module:Interaction~randomScroll
list.description:
Randomly scrolls the page for a specified duration and speed.

This function simulates human-like scrolling behavior by randomly
scrolling up or down within a page over a given period. The speed
of scrolling is also randomized to mimic natural user interactions.

list.title: module:Interaction~scrollToBottomPage
list.description:
Scrolls to the bottom of the page gradually.

This function scrolls the page downward in small increments until
it reaches the bottom. The scrolling is performed using `page.evaluate()`
to execute JavaScript in the browser context.

list.title: module:Interaction~scrollToElement
list.description:
Scrolls randomly to a specific element on the page.

This function smoothly scrolls to an element using either a CSS selector
or an XPath. It simulates human-like scrolling behavior by introducing
random scrolling movements before reaching the final position.

list.title: module:Interaction~selectOption
list.description:
Selects an option from a dropdown menu by its value.

This function interacts with a dropdown element to select an option based on its value.
It supports both CSS selectors and XPath for locating the dropdown.

list.title: module:Interaction~typeText
list.description: Types text into an input field using either a CSS selector or an XPath selector.

list.title: module:Interaction~typeTextBySelector
list.description: Types text into an input field using a CSS selector.

list.title: module:Interaction~typeTextByXpath
list.description: Types the specified text into an input field using an XPath selector.

list.title: module:Logging
list.description:
Provides functions for logging messages and actions, supporting both file-based and browser-context logging.
Logs can be sent to the console, stored in a file, or posted to a browser webview (if available).

list.title: module:Logging~logAction
list.description:
Logs an executed action within a specified folder.

Sends the log message to the browser's context using `window.chrome.webview.postMessage`, if supported.

list.title: module:Logging~logMessage
list.description:
Logs a message at a specified level and optionally sends it to the browser's context.

If `fileOnly` is `true`, the message is logged only to the file. Otherwise, it is also logged normally
and sent to the browser console using `window.chrome.webview.postMessage`, if supported.

list.title: module:domUtils
list.description:
Provides utility functions for interacting with the DOM.
This module includes methods to evaluate JavaScript on a page, check element existence,
retrieve elements, and extract attributes.

### Features:
- Execute JavaScript callbacks within the page context.
- Check if elements exist using CSS selectors or XPath expressions.
- Retrieve elements by various selector types.
- Extract attributes from elements dynamically.

list.title: module:domUtils~checkElement
list.description:
Checks whether an element exists on the page using a CSS selector or XPath expression.

This method supports both **CSS selectors** and **XPath expressions**, with an optional
visibility check. It returns a boolean indicating whether the element is present
and optionally visible.

list.title: module:domUtils~checkElementBySelector
list.description:
Checks whether an element matching the given CSS selector exists on the page.

This method evaluates the presence of an element using a CSS selector and
returns a boolean indicating its existence.

list.title: module:domUtils~checkElementByXpath
list.description:
Checks whether an element matching the given XPath expression exists on the page.

This method evaluates the presence of an element using an XPath selector and
returns a boolean indicating its existence.

list.title: module:domUtils~fetchDOM
list.description:
Executes a JavaScript function in the context of a page.

This method allows running arbitrary JavaScript code within the page context,
enabling interactions with and manipulation of the DOM. The result of the callback execution
is returned, and errors are handled gracefully.

list.title: module:domUtils~getAttribute
list.description:
Retrieves a specified attribute from an element on the page.

Supports commonly used attributes such as **name**, **value**, **href**, **innerText**,
and **innerHTML**, as well as any custom attributes.

list.title: module:domUtils~getElement
list.description:
Retrieves an element from the page based on a specified selector and type.

Supports various selector types including **CSS selectors**, **XPath expressions**, **IDs**,
and **class names**. Can also return multiple elements when using `allSelector` or `allXpath`.

list.title: module:frameUtils
list.description:
This module provides utility functions for interacting with iframes.

It includes functions to handle iframe elements, perform interactions like clicking and typing inside iframes, 
and wait for elements within iframes.

list.title: module:frameUtils~iframeCheckElement
list.description:
Checks if a specified element exists inside an iframe.

This function locates an iframe, accesses its context, and checks for the
presence of an element specified by the provided selector and type. It can
also verify if the element is visible.

list.title: module:frameUtils~iframeClearInput
list.description:
Clears the input field inside an iframe.

This function locates an iframe, accesses its context, and clears the text
inside an input field specified by the provided selector and type.

list.title: module:frameUtils~iframeClickElement
list.description:
Clicks an element inside an iframe.

This function locates an iframe, accesses its context, and clicks an element
within it using the provided selector and type.

list.title: module:frameUtils~iframeHandler
list.description:
Retrieves the frame element from an iframe on the page.

This function locates an iframe using a CSS selector or XPath expression
and returns its associated `Frame` object for further interactions.

list.title: module:frameUtils~iframeTypeText
list.description:
Types text inside an element within an iframe.

This function locates an iframe, accesses its context, and types the specified text
into an element inside it using the provided selector and type.

list.title: module:frameUtils~iframeWaitElements
list.description:
Recursively waits for one of the elements to appear inside an iframe.

This function checks periodically for the presence of any specified element
within an iframe, stopping when an element is found or the timeout is reached.

list.title: module:frameUtils~iframeWaitForElement
list.description:
Waits for an element to appear inside an iframe.

This function locates an iframe, accesses its context, and waits until
the specified element appears within it. The function resolves when the
element is found or times out if it doesn't appear.

list.title: module:navigation
list.description:
This module provides navigation utilities for handling URL navigation,
page reloads, and navigation history within a browser automation environment.

It includes functions to navigate to URLs, go back and forward in history,
check if a page is fully loaded, and wait for navigation events.

list.title: module:navigation~getURL
list.description: Retrieves the current URL of the page.

list.title: module:navigation~goToNextPage
list.description: Navigates forward to the next page if possible.

list.title: module:navigation~goToPreviousPage
list.description: Navigates back to the previous page if possible.

list.title: module:navigation~gotoURL
list.description: Navigates to the specified URL and waits for the page to load.

list.title: module:navigation~gotoURLHotmail
list.description: Navigates to the specified URL in a Hotmail-specific manner, handling frame navigation events.

list.title: module:navigation~isPageNavigating
list.description: Checks if the page is still navigating or if it has fully loaded.

list.title: module:navigation~reloadURL
list.description: Reloads the current page and optionally waits for specific events or elements.

list.title: module:navigation~waitForNavigation
list.description: Waits for the page to complete navigation.

list.title: module:navigation~waitForPageToLoad
list.description: Waits for the page to be fully loaded.

list.title: module:waitUtils
list.description:
Provides utility functions for waiting mechanisms, including fixed and random delays,
waiting for elements to appear, and handling navigation delays.

list.title: module:waitUtils~randomWait
list.description: Waits for a random duration between minSeconds and maxSeconds.

list.title: module:waitUtils~wait
list.description: Waits for a duration.

list.title: module:waitUtils~waitElements
list.description: Recursively wait for one of the elements to appear, checking periodically

list.title: module:waitUtils~waitForElement
list.description:
Waits for an element to exist on the page based on the given selector and type (Selector or XPath).
The resolves as soon as the element is present on the page.
